channel.title: I need all sorts of help
channel.description:
Alright.. so... I need to change my starting location my home emote button change the location of the portals to go somewhere and I would also like to change what people say. (above their heads)
ONE MORE THING - I NEED to change the title at the top from project czar to g-scape.. How would I do that
Anyone know one of these things please post.. Thanks

item.title: I need all sorts of help
item.dc:creator: @G-Scape.no-ip.org G-Scape.no-ip.org
item.description:
@G-Scape.no-ip.org wrote:

Alright thanks for the help… Im new btw :p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2008, 06:31:24 PM[/size][hr]Where should i enter the coords for the portals… and starting location? after x int —, y int —?

Read full topic

item.title: I need all sorts of help
item.dc:creator: @goodboi1112 goodboi1112
item.description:
@goodboi1112 wrote:

ok for the portals go to client.java and search for makeGlobalObject

and you will see the portal u want to change and change the first to numbers which are coords see easy…

Read full topic

item.title: I need all sorts of help
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

allright then go to NPC handler and hit CTRL + F… look at what the npc is saying and type part of that into the search box… then once there and you found the right thing change the text in the quotation marks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2008, 06:24:23 PM[/size][hr]hey dude everyone had to start somewhere… i bet you wernt good with java when you first started.

Read full topic

item.title: I need all sorts of help
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

Well this is the easiest way to do it… go to client.java and hit CTRL + H… once the box comes up, type Project Czar in the top box and G-scape in the bottom or replace with box. Once you have that hit replace all. That will change the most of it to G-scape on your server. The other little stuff you have to find with CTRL + F. Try typing project…etc…

well hope that helps

Read full topic
